Entities.Name: Dose
Entities.Definition: Any description of radiation dosage in the text, either the total dose or fractional doses, generally described using the unit gray (Gy) or centigray (cGy).

Sample Data.Sentence: The treatment plan was to deliver a total of 60 Gy in 30 fractions.

Entities.Name: Fraction Number
Entities.Definition: Fraction Number is any mention of the number of fractions delivered.

Sample Data.Sentence: The course consisted of 15 fractions over 3 weeks.

Entities.Name: Treatment Site
Entities.Definition: the anatomic site, relative region, or RT volume or field.

Entities.Name: Boost
Entities.Definition: A mention that conveys the treatment instance is a second phase of RT that brings a smaller treatment site to a higher dose.

Dataset.Name: Clinical Radiation Therapy Documents
Dataset.Details: A corpus of 495 documents from various sources including clinical notes and radiation therapy prescriptions, annotated for RT events and their properties.
